location_working_ind: individually on request, for Russian billiards
location_description: Admiral Grand Hall with an area of 242 sq. m.  Capacity: up to 200 people in theatre style and up to 120 for a banquet. High ceilings, natural light, stationary podium-stage and availability of dressing rooms make this place versatile.
location_description_1: Admiral Grand Hall with an area of 242 sq. m.  Capacity: up to 200 people in theatre style and up to 120 for a banquet. High ceilings, natural light, stationary podium-stage and availability of dressing rooms make this place versatile.
location_description_2: Cinema Hall with an area of 45 sq. m. accommodates up to 40 people in theatrical style. It is perfect for small trainings, conferences and master classes.
location_description_3: Black, Red and Fireplace Banquet Halls
location_description_4: The Bowling is represented by two lanes, guests are provided with spare footwear for children and adults. Russian billiards on two tables, equipped according to the rules.
